entries.name: Constance Blaize, Knight of the Prophet
Alexia Ciannor & the Risen & Thrall Warrior
Captain Sam MacHorne & the Devil Dogs
Gun Mage Captain Adept (Ashlynn: Viva La Resistance)
Taryn di la Rovissi, Llaelese Gun Mage

availableModels.models: Mercenary non-character warjacks
Precursor Knights, Captain Sam MacHorne & The Devil Dogs, Dannon Blythe & Bull
Anastasia di Bray, Gorman di Wulfe, Harlan Versh, Madelyn Corbeau, Rhupert Carvolo, Rutger Shaw, Taryn di la Rovissi

levels.benefit: This army can include non-character Cygnar Arcane Tempest Gun Mage units and Cygnar Gun Mage Captain Adept solos. These units are considered to be friendly Mercenary models instead of Cygnar models and can include attachments.

You can redeploy solos after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
Models in Ashlynn's battlegroup gain Advance Deployment

availableModels.models: Mercenary non-character warjacks with ranged weapons
Press Gangers, Sea Dog Deck Guns, Sea Dog Crews
Bloody Bradigan, Dirty Meg, Doc Killingsworth, Master Gunner Dougal MacNaile

levels.benefit: Press Ganger units gain Stealth during the first round of the game.
Sea Dog Deck Gun units gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

availableModels.models: Mercenary non-character monstrosities
Mercenary Drudge units
Mercenary Cephalyx solos

levels.benefit: Drudges in the army gain +2SPD during your first turn of the game.
Monstrosities in Cyphon's battlegroup gain Advance Move.
Add a minimum-sized Cephalyx Mind Slaver & Drugdes unit to the army free of cost.

availableModels.models: Mercenary non-character warjacks, Rocinante
Steelhead units
Steelhead solos

levels.benefit: Your deployment zone extended 2" forward.

Place Stannis Brocker and Steelhead Heavy Cavalry units after normal deployment. These models are placed at the same time as your models with Advance Deployment (if any). These models must be placed within your normal deployment zone.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Damiano's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Damiano does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

availableModels.models: Mercenary Rhulic non-character warjacks
Rhulic Mercenary units
Ogrun Bokurs, Gudrun the Wanderer, Thor Steinhammer

levels.benefit: You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.
Herne & Jonne and Horgenhold Artillery Corps units gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

availableModels.models: Mercenary non-character monstrosities
Cephalyx units
Cephalyx solos

levels.benefit: Additionally, the army can include up to one non-Cephalyx Mercenary unit if that unit includes a Cephalyx Dominator UA.

Cephalyx Mind Slaver & Drudge units gain Ambush. (You can choose not to deploy a unit with Ambush at the start of the game. If it is not deployed normally, you can put it into play at the end of any of your Control Phases after your first turn. When you do, choose any table edge except the back of your opponent’s deployment zone. Place the unit with Ambush within 3" of the chosen table edge.)
The army can include up to one additional non-Cephalyx Mercenary unit if that unit includes a Cephalyx Dominator UA.

availableModels.models: Mercenary non-character warjacks
Press Gangers, Sea Dog Crews, Mercenary Thamarite units, Croe's Cutthroats
Mercenary Thamarite solos, Doc Killingsworth, Kell Bailoch

levels.benefit: All units in the army are cultists. (Fiona can still gain only 1 focus point from cultists each turn regardless of how many are in her proximity.)

You can redeploy one model/unit for each Sea Dog Crew unit in the army after both players have deployed but before the first player 's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Fiona's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Fiona does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.
Models in Fiona's battlegroup gain Stealth during the first round of the game.

availableModels.models: Mercenary Rhulic non-character warjacks
Rhulic Mercenary units
Rhullic Mercenary solos, Brun & Lug

levels.benefit: Warjacks in Gorten's battlegroup gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Hammerfall High Shield Gun Corps units gain Advance Deployment

availableModels.models: Mercenary non-character warjacks
Steelhead units, Alexia Ciannor & The Risen, Captain Sam MacHorne & The Devil Dogs, Croe' s Cutthroats, Dannon Blythe & Bull
Alten Ashley, Gorman di Wulfe, Kell Bailoch, Orin Midwinter, Rhupert Carvolo, Rutger Shaw, Stannis Brocker, Taryn di la Rovissi, Thor Steinhammer

levels.benefit: You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by MacBain's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. MacBain does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.
Warjacks in MacBain's battlegroup gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

availableModels.models: Mercenary non-character warjacks
Idrian Skirmishers, Steelhead units, Greygore Boomhowler & Co., Croe's Cutthroats
Gorman di Wulfe, Kell Bailoch, Orin Midwinter, Saxon Orrik, Steelhead solos

levels.benefit: Additionally, this army can include one Cygnar Long Gunner Infantry unit or one Cygnar Trencher Infantry unit. This unit is considered to be a friendly Mercenary unit instead of a Cygnar unit and can include attachments.
Small-based Steelhead units gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

For each warjack in Magnus' battlegroup, place one wreck marker of the corresponding size anywhere within 20" of the back edge of Magnus' deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Wreck markers cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature.
Models in Magnus' battlegroup can begin the game affected by his upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models.

availableModels.models: Renegade and Talon light warjacks, Mangler, Mule, Rover, and Nomad heavy warjacks.
None
Kell Bailoch, Orin Midwinter, Saxon Orrik

levels.benefit: Magnus’ battlegroup can include Charger and Sentinel light warjacks and up to one Defender heavy warjack. This army can include Sword Knight, Ranger, and Trencher units and Sword Knight, Ranger, and Trencher non-character solos. These models are considered to be friendly Mercenary models instead of Cygnar models and can include attachments.
Warjacks in Magnus’ battlegroup are each allocated one focus point at the start of your first Control Phase of the game.

Saxon Orrik and one Sword Knight unit without a ’Jack-Marshaled warjack gain Ambush. If these models ambush, they must be placed during the same control phase. (You can choose not to deploy these models at the start of the game. If these models are not deployed normally, you can put them into play at the end of any of your Control Phases after your first turn. When you do, choose any table edge except the back of your opponent’s deployment zone. Place all models within 3? of the chosen table edge.)

availableModels.models: Mercenary non-character warjacks
Idrian Skirmishers, Steelhead units, Greygore Boomhowler & Co., Croe's Cutthroats
Gorman di Wulfe, Kell Bailoch, Orin Midwinter, Saxon Orrik, Steelhead solos

levels.benefit: Additionally, this army can include one Cygnar Long Gunner Infantry unit or one Cygnar Trencher Infantry unit. This unit is considered to be a friendly Mercenary unit instead of a Cygnar unit and can include attachments.

You can redeploy one unit/model after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
Models/units in this army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

availableModels.models: Mercenary Rhulic non-character warjacks, Rocinante
Mercenary Rhulic units
Mercenary Rhulic solos

levels.benefit: One unit in this army gains Advance Deployment.

For every two units in the army, place one trench template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Ossrum' s deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either pJayer deploys his army. Trench templates cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature but can be placed within 3" of each other.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Ossrum's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Ossrum does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.
Warjacks in Ossrum' s battlegroup gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.

levels.benefit: Models/units in this army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.
You gain+ 1 on your starting roll for the game.

This contract has no benefit.

availableModels.models: Mercenary Warcasters that work for Cryx, Khador

Mercenary solos that work for Cryx, Khador and Rhupert Carvolo.
Mercenary battle engines that work for Cryx, Khador

levels.benefit: The army can also include one Arcane Tempest Gun Mage unit or Long Gunner unit. This unit counts as a friendly Mercenary unit instead of a Cygnar unit and can include attachments. All solos included in the army gain Advance Deployment

levels.benefit: You gain +1 to the starting roll. You can redeploy all you solos after the Advance Deployment is done.
